website_summaries.verdict: Superstar Rihanna returns with a pointy toe sneaker to add to her smash-hit Fenty Creepers. The Puma Fenty Pointy Creeper Patent is a magnet for attention with a glossy, reflective upper paired to an unorthodox platform sole.This unique, unisex creeper is adored for its comfort payback and high-fashion desirability, that’s why many are tempted to clinch the deal even if it costs slightly expensive. Fenty lovers may need to note though that these snazzy pump tend to run small and quite heavier than its Creepers siblings.
pros: Fenty lovers adore the smooth and shiny cover of the Pointy Creeper Patent
A gorgeous take on the Fenty Creeper which can be dressed up or down
Male and female users mentioned that this pointy toe Fenty kick in patent finish looks elegant
A fashionable shoe to wear to work, dinner out, and other occasions, described by lots of reviewers
The Dove-Glacier Gray is indeed darker than the nude tone displayed online
Reviewers are swept away by the added height advantage
An adequately padded sneaker that’s comfortable to wear for the entire day, cited by many
Several reviewers did not pass the chance to order two designs
Reviewers bought one size larger than their typical shoe size and enjoyed the fit
Those who sized up said there’s enough space in the toe box
cons: Quite a lot of reviewers like the style but find it quite heavy
The tapered front caused toe aches, according to a handful
Many reviewers considered this shoe to be narrow
One male reviewer stated this is the most unflattering shoe he has worn
it made him look like Mr. Penguin from the Batman series

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow and not witchy on
customer_reviews.text: I would have passed these up had I seen them online or in a store because they look borderline witchy. I saw a friend with them on and they caught my eye. I love a good creeper, and own quite a few Fenty shoes..this bone color was a perfect change from the normal black. They definitely run a bit narrow so order a half size up if you have wide feet. They did take a bit of breaking in so not your normal comfy tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Inniac Yaj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - I’m always an 8 in pumas - I got an 8 and they fit perfect. I have quite narrow feet so maybe that’s why I wasn’t having issues with them. Those reviews made me nervous but my order was successful!
customer_reviews.author: Danyale

customer_reviews.title: LOVE FENTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always size up with pointed toe shoes. These are MUST to size up I would say. After breaking them in, they are fairly comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Throw these on with leggings, black tank, and an oversized cardigan and it's a cute, comfy outfit. I wish Puma had made these in more colors and styles!
customer_reviews.author: Hens

customer_reviews.title: Fenty x Puma is all 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes, they fit my style perfectly and go with whatever I'm wearing. While heavy, like all creepers, they seem very well made and are comfortable for full day wear/walking. I've gotten at least one compliment from a stranger every single time I've worn them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E Ay

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is narrow.  Good for narrow, short feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm in between 7.5 and 8, so I ordered the 8. They fit me pretty well, aside from some slight pressure on my pinky toes due to the narrow toe box area. I have abnormally short toes and narrow feet, though. I don't know how someone with normal feet could ever wear these shoes comfortably. Sizing up is recommended, though it would probably result in a roomy heel area
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Killer Fashion, but Kills your feet too!
customer_reviews.text: Great style, idea, price. But, you can not wear them since they weigh as much as cement blocks, and the inner lining is fraught with seams. Just trying them on it was clear not to go any further. I have an fairly narrow foot and these were tight in the width. The length is fine in my regular size. Too bad, because they are cool to look at, but I had to send them back for a hassle free refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love theses! Sizing was a concern because 70% of the time I need size 11 and I saw lots of reviews saying they run small. I took a chance and got the 10 because I couldn't find 11 anywhere. They fit like a dream! So comfortable and stylish. Decided to get the black as well.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe but they were too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Pope

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes if you like high sole and dont have very wide foot this shoe is for you a liitle heavy but very comfy anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Add a photo from top view of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Too pointy, and the photo is not representative of this.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: very cool looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and pretty cool looking! The color goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Oonim

product_meta.title: Puma Women's Fenty Pointy Creeper Patent Casual Shoe
product_meta.description: From the FENTY PUMA by Rihanna University Collection, this sleek remix of the Cleated Creeper features the same double-stacked sole, but unlike its predecessor the Pointy Creeper is equipped with a unique pointed toe and a sleek patent leather upper..
